response.overview: South Africa, 1978. Tim Jenkin and Stephen Lee, two white political activists from the African National Congress imprisoned by the apartheid regime, put a plan in motion to escape from the infamous Pretoria Prison.
response.title: Escape from Pretoria

titles.title: Flucht aus Pretoria - Sein Mut ist der Schlüssel
プリズン・エスケープ 脱出への10の鍵：2020
